Estonia: Fearful of Swedish attack, Russians burned down the city of Tartu.
India: Guru Granth Sahib becomes Guru of Sikhs.
Russia: Bulavin Rebellion: After a series of devastating military reversals, Bulavin was shot by his former followers. An imperial decree divided Russia into eight guberniyas (governorates).
Sweden: Charles XII crosses Vistula, opening attempted Swedish invasion of Russia
